UserStory.heading: Sound
UserStory.Description: As a player, I want to be able to control the volume in-game.
UserStory.DescriptionZH: 一个控制背景音乐的滑块
UserStory.INVEST: I - Yes. It doesn't concern other features. N - Yes. The story is a placeholder for a conversation, details can be negotiated later. V - Yes. Users will get a better experience in sound. E - Yes. We can estimate how long it will take since it is a small enough feature. S - Yes. It is small feature so it can therefore fit into a sprint easily. T - Yes. Tests were able to be created for it.
